mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advisor ( advisor_id, profile_image_url, certificate_name, certificate_file_sn, birth, certificate_file_number, consultation_fee, public_contact, is_approved, approved_at, is_profile_completed, created_at ) VALUES ( #{advisorId}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{certificateName}, #{certificateFileSn}, #{birth}, #{certificateFileNumber}, #{consultationFee}, #{publicContact}, #{isApproved}, #{approvedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isProfileCompleted}, NOW() )
